text: "The Killing Moon" is a 1984 song by Echo & the Bunnymen. It is the leading single from their fourth studio album Ocean Rain. It went to number 7 in Ireland, number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in New Zealand and number 96 in Australia. ==Track listing== * UK 12" # "The Killing Moon" (All Night Version) – 9:11 # "The Killing Moon" – 5:50 # "Do It Clean" (Recorded live at the Royal Albert Hall London 18 July 1983) – 6:36 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Echo & the Bunnymen songs Category:Gothic rock songs
title: The Killing Moon
